notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: E.N.P. Conceptualization, project administration, experimental design, formal analyses of data, writing-original draft preparation and editing; V.V. Laboratory analyses of gene expression and fatty acid for muscle longissimus lumborum and part of draft preparation; K.G. Statistical analyses of experimental data and preparation of figures; P.L. Laboratory analysis of enzyme activities for muscle longissimus lumborum and interpretation of results; J.L.J. Experimental design, project administration and manuscript reviewing; F.R.D. Interpretation of results for gene expression and manuscript preparation.
